author: trent_vanepps
content:

Register at sms.ethglobal.co

author: jc6763
content: From Trent link above It was interesting to learn super briefly how Filecoin transaction (tx) execution happens 1 block after the tx is included in a block... So that definitely has effects on their implementation of 1559.  But how much of an effect? For example, how much of their 1559 mempool implementation could apply to Geth etc when Geth implements 1559?   (I posted this in 1559-dev too in case it belonged better there)
